    #include <stdio.h>			/*  ry_7  */
  inline int scan()
{
int t=0;
char c;
c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c<'0' || c>'9')
c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c>='0' && c<='9')
{
t=(t<<3)+(t<<1)+c-'0';
c=getchar_unlocked();
}
return(t);
}
inline void print(int a)
{
char num[20];
int i=0;
do
{
num[i++]=a%10+48;
a=a/10;
}while(a!=0);
i=i-1;
while(i>=0)
putchar_unlocked(num[i--]);
putchar_unlocked('\n');
}
    #define gc getchar_unlocked
    int fi() {
    char c = gc();
    while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
    int ret = 0;
    while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
    ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
    c = gc();
    }
    return ret;
    }
     
    int main()
    {
    int a[100002],n, curr, max,i, t;
    t=scan();
    while(t--){
    n= scan();
    max = scan();
    curr = max;
    for(i =0 ; i<n-1;i++)
    {
    curr = scan();
    if(curr>max){
    max=curr;
    }
    }
     
    print(max);
    }
     
     
     
    return 0;
    }
